template.template: Template SNMP Keepalived Check Real Servers
template.name: Template SNMP Keepalived Check Real Servers

item.name: realServerActionWhenDown 1.1
item.description:
What action is performed when this server is down. Its weight can be set to 0 (inhibit) or it can be removed from the pool.
remove (1) inhibit (2)

item.name: realServerActionWhenDown 1.2
item.description:
What action is performed when this server is down. Its weight can be set to 0 (inhibit) or it can be removed from the pool.
remove (1) inhibit (2)

item.name: realServerAddress 1.1
item.description: IP address of this real server.

item.name: realServerAddress 1.2
item.description: IP address of this real server.

item.name: realServerAddrType 1.1
item.description:
Address family for this real server.
unknown (0) ipv4 (1) ipv6 (2) ipv4z (3) ipv6z (4) dns (16)

item.name: realServerAddrType 1.2
item.description:
Address family for this real server.
unknown (0) ipv4 (1) ipv6 (2) ipv4z (3) ipv6z (4) dns (16)

item.name: realServerFailedChecks 1.1
item.description: How many failed checks for this real server.

item.name: realServerFailedChecks 1.2
item.description: How many failed checks for this real server.

item.name: realServerLowerConnectionLimit 1.1
item.description: Minimum number of connections for this real server.

item.name: realServerLowerConnectionLimit 1.2
item.description: Minimum number of connections for this real server.

item.name: realServerNotifyDown 1.1
item.description: Command to execute when this server becomes dead.

item.name: realServerNotifyDown 1.2
item.description: Command to execute when this server becomes dead.

item.name: realServerNotifyUp 1.1
item.description: Command to execute when this server becomes alive.

item.name: realServerNotifyUp 1.2
item.description: Command to execute when this server becomes alive.

item.name: realServerPort 1.1
item.description: Port (e.g. TCP or UDP) of the service.

item.name: realServerPort 1.2
item.description: Port (e.g. TCP or UDP) of the service.

item.name: realServerRateCps 1.1
item.description: Current connection rate (connections/sec) for this real server.

item.name: realServerRateCps 1.2
item.description: Current connection rate (connections/sec) for this real server.

item.name: realServerRateInBPS 1.1
item.description: Current incoming rate (Bytes/sec) for this real server.

item.name: realServerRateInBPS 1.2
item.description: Current incoming rate (Bytes/sec) for this real server.

item.name: realServerRateInPPS 1.1
item.description: Current incoming rate (Packets/sec) for this real server.

item.name: realServerRateInPPS 1.2
item.description: Current incoming rate (Packets/sec) for this real server.

item.name: realServerRateOutBPS 1.1
item.description: Current outgoing rate (Bytes/sec) for this real server.

item.name: realServerRateOutBPS 1.2
item.description: Current outgoing rate (Bytes/sec) for this real server.

item.name: realServerRateOutPPS 1.1
item.description: Current outgoing rate (Packets/sec) for this real server.

item.name: realServerRateOutPPS 1.2
item.description: Current outgoing rate (Packets/sec) for this real server.

item.name: realServerStatsActiveConns 1.1
item.description: Current active connections for this real server.

item.name: realServerStatsActiveConns 1.2
item.description: Current active connections for this real server.

item.name: realServerStatsConns 1.1
item.description: Total number of connections scheduled for this real server.

item.name: realServerStatsConns 1.2
item.description: Total number of connections scheduled for this real server.

item.name: realServerStatsInactiveConns 1.1
item.description: Current inactive connections for this real server.

item.name: realServerStatsInactiveConns 1.2
item.description: Current inactive connections for this real server.

item.name: realServerStatsInBytes 1.1
item.description: Total number of incoming bytes for this real server.

item.name: realServerStatsInBytes 1.2
item.description: Total number of incoming bytes for this real server.

item.name: realServerStatsInPkts 1.1
item.description: Total number of incoming packets for this real server.

item.name: realServerStatsInPkts 1.2
item.description: Total number of incoming packets for this real server.

item.name: realServerStatsOutBytes 1.1
item.description: Total number of outgoing bytes for this real server.

item.name: realServerStatsOutBytes 1.2
item.description: Total number of outgoing bytes for this real server.

item.name: realServerStatsOutPkts 1.1
item.description: Total number of outgoing packets for this real server.

item.name: realServerStatsOutPkts 1.2
item.description: Total number of outgoing packets for this real server.

item.name: realServerStatsPersistentConns 1.1
item.description: Current persistent connections for this real server.

item.name: realServerStatsPersistentConns 1.2
item.description: Current persistent connections for this real server.

item.name: realServerStatus 1.1
item.description:
Status of this real server.
alive (1) dead (2)

item.name: realServerStatus 1.2
item.description:
Status of this real server.
alive (1) dead (2)

item.name: realServerType 1.1
item.description:
Type of real server: either a regular real server or a sorry server.
regular (1) sorry (2)

item.name: realServerType 1.2
item.description:
Type of real server: either a regular real server or a sorry server.
regular (1) sorry (2)

item.name: realServerUpperConnectionLimit 1.1
item.description: Maximum number of connections for this real server.

item.name: realServerUpperConnectionLimit 1.2
item.description: Maximum number of connections for this real server.

item.name: realServerWeight 1.1
item.description: Weight of this real server. This value can be set to 0 to disable the real server.

item.name: realServerWeight 1.2
item.description: Weight of this real server. This value can be set to 0 to disable the real server.
